name: PacLam
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
Enter or Space Bar - Interact and Shoot

RULES:

- If you come into contact with the Top Dog (Red), it's a game over
- If you come into contact with the other wolves , a temporary speed boost is given to the Top Dog
- You must collect all the ammo in order to have enough bullets to kill all the wolves
- You are able to obtain the gun when all wolves 4 are out of the hatch
- If you shoot and miss, it's a game over

DESCRIPTION:

This is my first solo game jam submission for the 2021 Global Game Jam.

The theme was "Lost and Found". I wanted to make a game that was about the exchange of power (i.e. losing and finding power). So I used bullying and revenge as my main themes. I thought that PacMan would be a good model for this because there is a very clear point in time where the enemies, who have total power over the player, become completely powerless and the whole dynamic of the game changes

MUSIC SOURCES:

- Opening Theme - Brittle Bones Nicky by Rare Americans
- Level Theme - Psycho Killer by The Talking Heads
- Game Over - Kefka's Laugh from Final Fantasy VI
- Beeps and Boops - Little Robot Sound Factory
